title: S16 Ep64: Yorkshire’s Weird Wolds: Werewolves, Ghosts & Screaming Skulls w/ Charles Christian
itunes:title: Yorkshire’s Weird Wolds: Werewolves, Ghosts & Screaming Skulls w/ Charles Christian
description:
Darkness Radio presents Yorkshire’s Weird Wolds: Werewolves, Ghosts & Screaming Skulls with Charles Christian.

Dave & Tim take a journey to the darker side of Yorkshire. If you are fascinated by the weird, the unexplained and the bizarre, join us in the Wold Newton Triangle, where rather odd events have occurred, unmatched anywhere else in Britain.

We reveal encounters with werewolves, zombies, vampires, green skinned fairy folk, headless ghosts, screaming skulls, miracle-working priests, and more...so much more!

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3uMoKOQ
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
